ygData.subject: Re: lost mana when target corner
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes,  walls are either clipping, or no clipping (Verant refers to them as thick wall and thin walls)  I bet you could cast through a thin wall, like the walls
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, walls are either clipping, or no clipping (Verant refers to them as thick
wall and thin walls) I bet you could cast through a thin wall, like the walls
of an inn, but not thick walls which are most walls in a major dungeon. I'll
try to verify this tonight.

Malkin

Lim Dul wrote:

> From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Yup, definitely happens for me. Never really bugged me because I've assumed
> you have to see your target to direct an attack against it. Your experience
> in the mino caves might be unique to that area I think only because of the
> way they had set up the walls there? (ie the way the minos can strike
> through the walls might have something to do with why you can hit them
> through the walls there too).
>
> Best to fight away from corners I guess.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
